channel.title: Skyrim article from "Christwire"
channel.description:
[url]https://christwire.org/2011/11/is-skyrim-teaching-your-children-how-to-perform-rim-jobs-and-other-homo-erotic-sex-maneuvers/[/url]
Oh my god, this...this cant be real. If it is, I have lost all faith in humanity.
Either way, discuss.
EDIT: Sorry, I lost it long ago. Guess I forgot. :retard:
[b]EDIT AGAIN: JUST learned it's a satire website. I knew it couldn't be real, but yeah. Discuss Skyrim here I guess.[/b]

item.title: Skyrim article from "Christwire"
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I read your post, but then I looked at your avatar while reading it, and the two seemed to fit very well for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim article from "Christwire"
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I was already pretty gay before playing Skyrim but now I’m a Demonic Gay Hellspawn and I’m loving all the constant demonic orgasms I’m getting now.

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim article from "Christwire"
item.dc:creator: Phobos001
item.description:
Ceej2012:

“Right off the bat, the gay supporting software company Blizzard, shows the player images…”

Come on, you fell for this even after this statement?

I don’t know what happened; All the sudden my mental defenses from random bullshit dropped and let it all in! Then after a few minutes I thought “Oh dear god I’m stupid…”

Read full topic

item.title: Skyrim article from "Christwire"
item.dc:creator: DeleteThis
item.description:
Christwire Article:

SKYRIM LINGO: DOVAHKIIN – Is the supposed citizens of Skyrim, but is a code word that means:
D – Dirty
O – Orifice
V – Violation
A – Always
H – Hurts
K – Keep
I – Injecting
I – It
N – Naiant

a ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

Read full topic
